commands.description: Create a new user account on the system.

commands.description: Change user password and password-related settings.

commands.description: Execute a command as another user, typically the superuser.

commands.description: Change file permissions and access modes.

commands.description: Change file owner and group ownership.
commands.usecase: Recursively change ownership of web directory

commands.usecase: Add user to sudo group for administrative privileges
commands.author: Julianne Frances Haugh
